mapper.select: SELECT p.authority FROM `sys_user` AS u INNER JOIN user_role_relation AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN role_permission_relation AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN permission as p ON rp.permissin_id = p.id WHERE u.user_id = #{id}
SELECT r.role_name FROM `sys_user` AS u INNER JOIN user_role_relation AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.user_id =#{id}
